title: Doctors worry Shingrix side effects will put patients off their second dose
author: Eric Sagonowsky
description: The CDC has urged people 50 and older to get GlaxoSmithKline's new shingles vaccine to protect against a notoriously pa | Patients might be hesitant to return for their second Shingrix dose if they experience side effects, according to doctors.
